benchmark_details.name: ImageCLEFmedical 2023
benchmark_details.overview: ImageCLEFmedical 2023 is a dataset designed for Diagnostic Captioning (DC), containing 71,355 medical images with gold tags and diagnostic captions, aimed at providing automated diagnostic reports from medical images.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset for developing and evaluating Diagnostic Captioning systems that generate medical reports from images.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset is limited to specific conditions, regions, and language (English).

data.source: The dataset consists of medical images, gold tags, and gold diagnostic captions sourced from the ImageCLEF and MIMIC-CXR projects.
data.annotation: Gold tags and captions provided with the images.

methodology.calculation: Performance metrics are calculated based on comparisons between generated captions and gold captions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher BLEU and BLEURT scores indicate better alignment with gold captions.
methodology.baseline_results: Standard beam search decoding performance serves as baseline comparisons.
methodology.validation: The dataset was split into training, validation, and test sets (75%-10%-15% split).

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Concerns regarding biomedical data privacy due to the sensitive nature of medical data.
